stimulusHtml: Assume that the  int  variable  num  is properly declared and initialized to a value greater than 0. Which of the following best describes the value returned by the call  mystery(num)?

features.html:
Consider the following method.

 

public static int mystery(int n) 
{ 
   if (n < 10) 
   {
      return n;  
   }   
   return (n % 10) + mystery(n / 10);  
}

choicesHtml: The sum of the digits of  num
Two times the rightmost digit of  num
